text: Hojatollah Khatib (; 1954 - 26 April 2015) was an Iranian sports administrator. He was the chairman of multisport club Persepolis Athletic and Cultural Club based in Tehran between July 2004 and December 2005. He was also a wrestling president. He died from cancer in Tehran, aged 61. ==References== Category:1954 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Iranian businesspeople Category:Cancer deaths in Iran Category:Iranian Muslims Category:People from Tehran Category:Sports executives and administrators
title: Hojatollah Khatib
